subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Michael McKenry drove in the first earned run allowed by Aroldis Chapman this season with a double in the 10th inning, and the Pittsburgh Pirates rallied to a 5-4 victory over the Cincinnati Reds.
snippet: Michael McKenry drove in the first earned run allowed by Aroldis Chapman this season with a double in the 10th inning, and the Pittsburgh Pirates rallied to a 5-4 victory over the Cincinnati Reds.
